ygData.subject: SV: About the items... worthy quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah you missed the ogre head quest in kaladim, you get blackend armor for turning in 2 heads and the item is random. So sometimes you get the blackend iron
ygData.messageBody:
yeah


you missed the ogre head quest in kaladim, you get blackend armor for turning in 2 heads and the item is random. So sometimes you get the blackend iron crown that have some nice stats.


/Askur aka Askan gnome and Dwarf of Veeshan


-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Fr�n: Stauss, Aaron <Aaron.Stauss@...>
Till: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com' <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Datum: den 11 augusti 1999 19:41
�mne: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] About the items... worthy quests?


>From: "Stauss, Aaron" <Aaron.Stauss@...>
>
> I agree...the quest system is quite irritating. I keep a
>running list of all items in game and off my list there are only 54 items
>one can receive from a quest <mind you 8 of those are the monk
>headband/sashes> . To my knowledge the following quests are the only ones
>worth doing for item rewards <not faction fixes> that one could conceivably
>sell.
>
> Brewer's compendium - glowing stein
> Jewel quest - Ivandyr's hoop/midnight/mallet
> Hollow skull quest - jeweled skull
> Red V quest - Bullsmasher
> Lens quest - staff of the observers
> Trueshot quest - trueshot bow
> Centaur quests - crafted armor
>
> Did I miss any?
>
